briefdescription.para: Write PMP Configuration to corresponding PMP_CFG register.

parameterdescription.para: PMP entry index, valid value is 0-15

briefdescription.para: Write PMP address to corresponding PMP_ADDR register.

parameterdescription.para: PMP address entry index, valid value is 0-15

briefdescription.para: Write PMA Configuration to corresponding PMA_CFG register.

parameterdescription.para: PMA entry index, valid value is 0-15

briefdescription.para: Write PMA address to corresponding PMA_ADDR register.

parameterdescription.para: PMA address entry index, valid value is 0-15
PMA address entry index, valid value is 0-15

briefdescription.para: Configure PMP and PMA for specified PMP/PMA entry.
Configure PMP and PMA based on the PMP entry list.

parameterdescription.para: start of the PMP entry list
Number of entries in the PMP entry list
